quotes.quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The obstacle on the path becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to not be like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: To live the good life: We have the potential for it... If we can learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Don't let your reflection on the whole sweep of life crush you. Don't fill your mind with all the bad things that might still happen. Stay focused on the prsent situation and ask yourself why it's so unbearable and can't be survived.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
